## Description

Select feature info


## Usage

```r
select_feature_info(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_feature_info`](#getfeatureinfo)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("feat_type")), list("name of feature (e.g. \"rna\", \"dna\", \"protein\")")), "\n", "  ")
